title: Towards a Generalizable Foundation Model for Multi-Tissue Musculoskeletal MRI Segmentation
details: G Hoyer, M Tong, S Majumdar, V Pedoia
abstract: Results: SAM performed decently on zero-shot of medical data. The ability of SAM to perform well when finetuned on a spectrum of data, is somewhat lacking and requires additional evaluation. Impact: A foundational model for generalizable …
